title: [ Legacy Scaling and Distribution] HTTP API  replication?command=disablereplication  & replication?command=disablepoll  are not  persisistentt
description:
Disablepoll and DisableReplication are not persistent after a solr restart.

Is there a workaround to make this possible ?

comments.author: Ahmet Arslan
comments.content: I needed this before, please see the relevant question and its replies on mailing list : http://find.searchhub.org/document/fc30ce4b47e0eb61
